short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Group your favorite sites and access them with just a click

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is a ‘newTab’ extension to group bookmarks easily. This extension is highly customizable and has no dependencies. It enables the user to access the configured bookmarks in a fast and easy way:

-	no special permissions needed
-	unlimited amount of groups
-	unlimited amount of bookmarks per group
-	layout per group
-	fast and easy switching between groups
-	fast and easy bookmark access
-	one searchbox per group
-	fast and easy search-engine switching
-	video backgrounds
-	drag and drop support
-	date/time support
-	keyboard shortcuts support
-	mouse-wheel support
-	highly customizable
-	...
